intro:
★ Drive. Master. Deliver. ★
Race against time to transport goods across various environment.
description:
★ WELCOME TO TRANSPORTER ★
A solo platform racing game, technical and competitive.

★ THE CONCEPT:
Choose from 3 vehicle types: Classic, Amphibious, or Military.
Your mission: deliver your cargo while avoiding obstacles, and cross the finish line with at least one item intact.

★ TECHNICAL GAMEPLAY:
Choose the right vehicle
Adjust your speed
Maintain your balance
Analyze the terrain and overcome obstacles

★ AVAILABLE WORLDS:
Indy Jungle – ideal for 4x4 vehicles
Operation Overlord – combat-focused, perfect for military vehicles
Expect around 20 hours to complete the game — and much more if you're aiming for the top of the global leaderboards!

★ VEHICLES:
Unlock 19 unique vehicles
• Classic (versatile)
• Amphibious (fast on water)
• Military (armored, can shoot)

★ GARAGE:
Tune 5 parameters: power, suspension, grip, brakes, fuel tank
Special upgrades: armor, handling, electromagnetism, and more

★ CARGO:
Unlock 11 types of cargo to deliver.

★ GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS:
Compare your scores with other players in each race via online rankings.
